alert.note: Alert for Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 03 at 6:35PM MDT until August 03 at 8:15PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR NORTHWESTERN PUEBLO COUNTY... At 635 PM MDT, Trained weather spotters reported heavy rainfall has ended in Pueblo West. Between 1.5 and 3 inches of rain have fallen, and Flash flooding will persist as run-off from earlier heavy rainfall continues. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Trained spotters reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Northern Pueblo, Pueblo West and Pueblo Reservoir. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Remain alert for flooding even in locations not receiving rain. Arroyos, streams, and rivers can become raging killer currents in a matter of minutes, even from distant rainfall.
